body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations      Make Your Group Reservation Today! Reservations for group visits can be made by printing and filling out our reservation form and returning by fax (315-568-2141) or by email.You may also call us at 315-568-0024 if you would like to speak with a Park Ranger about scheduling a visit.     PERMITSA special use permit is required for the following activities:  Special Events Public Assemblies and Meetings Sale and Distribution of printed matter Commercial and Private Operations Commercial photography Commercial Film Making  Permit applications must be filed with the Superintendent at least 30 days before the anticipated activity. See below list.  Contact us to request a hardcopy application or to receive more information about permits.      Download and fax (315)568-2141 Special Use Permit (short form) Special Use Permit (long form) Filming & Still Photography Permit (short form) Filming & Still Photography Permit (long form) Vehicle & Watercraft Permit
title: Women's Rights National Historical Park: Permits & Reservations
